body:
{
  "tb365Data": {
    "projectName": "Simple Test Template",
    "savedAt": "2025-01-30T10:00:00.000Z",
    "version": "1.0",
    "canvasState": {
      "elements": [
        {
          "id": "background-rect",
          "type": "rectangle",
          "position": { "x": 0, "y": 0 },
          "size": { "width": 400, "height": 60 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "background",
          "zIndex": 1,
          "fill": "#2c5aa0",
          "stroke": "#1e3f73",
          "strokeWidth": 1,
          "cornerRadius": 5
        },
        {
          "id": "location-text",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 80 },
          "size": { "width": 360, "height": 25 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "location",
          "zIndex": 2,
          "content": "{{property.city}}, {{property.state}}",
          "fontSize": 18,
          "fontFamily": "Arial",
          "fontWeight": "bold",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "center",
          "color": "#333333",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "title-text",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 120 },
          "size": { "width": 360, "height": 30 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "title",
          "zIndex": 3,
          "content": "Beautiful Home for Sale",
          "fontSize": 24,
          "fontFamily": "Georgia",
          "fontWeight": "bold",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "center",
          "color": "#2c5aa0",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        }
      ],
      "selectedElementId": null,
      "editingElementId": null,
      "editingTableCell": null,
      "activeTool": "select",
      "canvasSize": { "width": 400, "height": 200 },
      "zoom": 1,
      "snapToGrid": false,
      "gridSize": 20
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "outputFormat": "json",
    "includeAssets": false,
    "generatePreview": false
  }
}
